1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json).

2004.issue: [E2004] Version "0.1.1" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/io-package.json) does not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.milight). Please remove from news section.

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5005.issue: [W5005] setTimeout found in "milight.js", but no clearTimeout detected

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

5031.issue: [S5031] "gulpfile.js" found in repo while @iobroker/adapter-dev already used. Please check if gulp is still needed.

6005.issue: [E6005] No actual year found in copyright at [README.md](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/README.md). Please add "Copyright (c) 2025 foxthefox <>" at start of LICENSE section.

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '16' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/foxthefox/ioBroker.milight/blob/master/package.json).
